Desc.eng: Before you start killing my boys, hear me out and consider my offer, Sir.
The best offer I'll give you is that you get to keep your life if you leave immediately!
Yes, we've taken generous donations from the refugees. But we also provided food and protection against other criminals in return, while you were away.
Oh, a knight in shiny armor. With a dagger behind his back.
I'm giving you a cut from the operation. 20.000 gold, if you let us stay. It's such a nice Lair, anyway. It would be a shame if anything happened to it...
Give all that money back to the civilians and you can stay. For now.
Trying to blackmail Van Helsing in his own Lair? A grave mistake.
